title: Is GP getting nerfed?
body:
He feels so OP that I would normally be pretty much positive, but there is so much crazy stuff going on right now I feel like I have to ask.

I'm wondering if I need to wait before I get too familiar with his current power level :)

replies.body: No changes in 5.15 at the very least. Right now there are a lot of people playing GP who've never played him before and even those that have are having to learn some new stuff given the kit changes. That's making it a bit hard to get a gauge on what his long term power's like, initial reaction though is that it's in roughly the right ballpark.
Thanks!  Seems like I should get back on it them :)
